Text: RE Starting DateI hope everything is going well with respect to your work load I know that you are probably very busy with conference calls Anyway I look forward to working in your department this summer I have already taken my drug test and have given Molly Magee my start dates tentatively with your approval I have my start date scheduled to commence on May and end on June I hope these dates coincide with your schedule Please email me and let me know Looking Forward to this summer Majed Nachawati Original Message From To entralUHEDU Sent PM Subject Starting Date Nabil Can you please provide the dates that you are planning on working for the st half of the summer I called your residence earlier today but your machine did not pick up It is probably easier to communicate via email since we both keep missing each other Thanks

RE Starting DateI hope everything is going well in the office The start date remains the same May st I wanted to know if I report to you on the st or if I need to report to Molly Magee in Human Resources for anymore paperwork etc Talk to you soon Majed Nachawati Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday May AM To entralUHEDU Subject RE Starting Date Majed Wanted to make sure you are still scheduled to start on May Let me know if anything has changed Thanks Forwarded by Gerald NemecHOUECT on AM Nachawati Nabil M To entr cc alUHEDU Subject RE Starting Date PM Gerald I hope everything is going well with respect to your work load I know that you are probably very busy with conference calls Anyway I look forward to working in your department this summer I have already taken my drug test and have given Molly Magee my start dates tentatively with your approval I have my start date scheduled to commence on May and end on June I hope these dates coincide with your schedule Please email me and let me know Looking Forward to this summer Majed Nachawati Original Message From To entralUHEDU Sent PM Subject Starting Date Nabil Can you please provide the dates that you are planning on working for the st half of the summer I called your residence earlier today but your machine did not pick up It is probably easier to communicate via email since we both keep missing each other Thanks

RE Starting DateI spoke with Jennifer Whitney regarding paperwork and orientation I am scheduled to meet with Jennifer at am on May After completing the requisite paperwork I am scheduled to report to your legal department I just wanted to inform you so that you know what I will be doing on the morning of the st See you on Monday Majed Nachawati Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday May PM To entralUHEDU Subject RE Starting Date Give Molly a call and check with her She may want you to report to her first Otherwise well see you on the st Nachawati Nabil M To entr cc alUHEDU Subject RE Starting Date PM Gerald I hope everything is going well in the office The start date remains the same May st I wanted to know if I report to you on the st or if I need to report to Molly Magee in Human Resources for anymore paperwork etc Talk to you soon Majed Nachawati Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday May AM To entralUHEDU Subject RE Starting Date Majed Wanted to make sure you are still scheduled to start on May Let me know if anything has changed Thanks Forwarded by Gerald NemecHOUECT on AM Nachawati Nabil M To entr cc alUHEDU Subject RE Starting Date PM Gerald I hope everything is going well with respect to your work load I know that you are probably very busy with conference calls Anyway I look forward to working in your department this summer I have already taken my drug test and have given Molly Magee my start dates tentatively with your approval I have my start date scheduled to commence on May and end on June I hope these dates coincide with your schedule Please email me and let me know Looking Forward to this summer Majed Nachawati Original Message From To entralUHEDU Sent PM Subject Starting Date Nabil Can you please provide the dates that you are planning on working for the st half of the summer I called your residence earlier today but your machine did not pick up It is probably easier to communicate via email since we both keep missing each other Thanks

Your summer clerkNonPrivilegedpst Gerald I am so sorry that I have not gotten back with you regarding the message you left me I have just been so busy with the write on competition for law review It is finally over thank god Anyway I have electronic deposit so I dont need my check stub How is everything with your new clerk I hope all is well with you Let me know when you are free for lunch so we can all go out I guess we will drag Debra along jk Anyway I want to say that it was great working with you Write back soon Best Regards Majed Nachawati

RE Your summer clerkNonPrivilegedpst Tuesday is fine with me or in the alternative Wed is also fine Just let me know Gerald since I know you might have lunch plans with one of your girlfriends jk Talk to you soon Majed Original Message From To entralUHEDU Sent PM Subject RE Your summer clerk No problem I will just destroy the direct deposit slip Good luck with the write on competition Lunch sounds great This week is kind of busy but maybe next week Tuesday or Wednesday Yes I guess we can allow Debra to go with us Gerald Original Message From Nachawati Nabil M entralUHEDUENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESNachawatiCNabilCMCnnachawaCen tralEUHEEDUE NRONcom Sent Monday July PM To Nemec Gerald Subject Your summer clerk Gerald I am so sorry that I have not gotten back with you regarding the message you left me I have just been so busy with the write on competition for law review It is finally over thank god Anyway I have electronic deposit so I dont need my check stub How is everything with your new clerk I hope all is well with you Let me know when you are free for lunch so we can all go out I guess we will drag Debra along jk Anyway I want to say that it was great working with you Write back soon Best Regards Majed Nachawati

RE Your summer clerkNonPrivilegedpst That sounds great to me see you on Wed Majed Original Message From To entralUHEDU Sent PM Subject RE Your summer clerk Lets plan on Wednesday How about we meet at Treebeards in the tunnel around Let me know if that works for you If you are not a fan of Treebeards we can do something else Original Message From Nachawati Nabil M entralUHEDUENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESNachawatiCNabilCMCnnachawaCen tralEUHEEDUE NRONcom Sent Wednesday July AM To Nemec Gerald Subject RE Your summer clerk Tuesday is fine with me or in the alternative Wed is also fine guess we will drag Debra along jk Anyway I want to say that it was great working with you Write back soon Best Regards Majed Nachawati This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
